bibl.title: Potpourri.
bibl.note: Parchment fragments from Hermupolis (?). - 1. Inv. 23139. Genesis 1.1-5 in Samaritan script. - 2. Inv. 21291. I Reg. 4.6,9,13,15-16. VI-VIIth c. - 3. Inv. 21289. IV. Reg. 20.5-6, 10-12. VI-VIIth c. - 4. Inv. 16994 [ed.: Kurt Treu, ArchPF 18 (1966) pp. 29-30 (= van Haelst 410)] + 21290. Lc. 7.20-21, 33-35. VIth c. - 5. Inv. 21288. Odyssey 10. 99-108, 138-146. VI-VIIth c. - 6. Inv. 21287. Thucydides 3.22.8 ff. VIIth c. - 7. Inv. 21299 (papyrus). Vergil, Aeneid X 832-836, 863-867. IVth c. - 8. Inv. 11753 [ed.: Paul M. Meyer, ZSav 42 (1921) pp. 42-57 (= Pack2 2957)] + 21294. De Formula Fabiana. IVth c.
